text: "Smoke on the Water" is a 1973 song by British rock band Deep Purple and was taken from their sixth studio album Machine Head. It was based on the 1971 fire at the Montreux Casino, Switzerland. It went to number 4 in the United States, number 21 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Canada, number 54 in Australia, number 11 in the Netherlands and Austria, number 20 in Germany and number 64 in France. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Deep Purple songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Smoke on the Water
